creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: a piece from the cycle of tapestries woven for Marie de' Medici, The Stories of Queen Artemisia, based on an epic account by Nicolas Houel; woven in the Faubourg Saint-Marcel Manufactory of Marc de Conans and François de la Planche; warp undyed wool, 6½-7½ inds per cm., weft dyed wool and silk, silver and silver-gilt yarns, 24-40 ends per cm.
medium: Wool, silk, silver and silver-gilt yarns; tapestry weave
title: The Gifts
